documents.document: @Alex_Panetta Well to be sure -there are a few other major things going on !!
POTUS tells CEOs he wants lower drug prices and pledges to speed up drug approval times. https://t.co/OpCpmptes2
In Roosevelt Room, pharma execs await POTUS. https://t.co/uIs9DxmP8d
I'm going home now. Do I have to watch out for the bobcat? I lost track w all the other news.
Trump fires top lawyer who defied immigration order with @JuliaEAinsley https://t.co/a1twZTwx9x
Our final story tonight on chaos, anger after POTUS halted entry for immigrants from seven countries, refugees https://t.co/vutwTSjItF
Here's our final take for tonight on the Trump refugee order, by @robertarampton and @ewstephe and @micarosenberg https://t.co/FTWMCzxL6e
Trump administration seems to have the hang of the Friday night news drop right from the get-go.
@justinsink @AndrewBeatty are there pints there? Because could use one or five.
What British PM May will see when she comes to the WH today. https://t.co/yxUqT8dN9t
Gird yourself for a flood of tweets about POTUS first Marine One ride https://t.co/kmvgbuUSP7
POTUS is about to speak to DHS employees. He signed two executive orders related to border security / public securiâ€¦ https://t.co/1RGPeNMT4f

@drphyllis Marillyn Hewson, CEO of Lockheed Martin.

Some of the CEOs - Underarmor. Whirlpool. International Paper. Dow Chemical.
Business leaders gather to meet with @realDonaldTrump in Roosevelt Room. https://t.co/YBQfJbqg6B
@AndrewBeatty Sort of surprised you haven't provoked that kind of reax before tbh ðŸ˜‚

Judiciary Square station - long line waiting to go up escalator. https://t.co/GFpX8g15Eg
Fri: my Metro stop full of people going to the Mall to cheer Trump. Today: packed with people going to protest him. https://t.co/q7ZNrYGLIP
Now Commander-in-Chief, Trump salutes at the end of the waltz. https://t.co/Iux9lQhNyg
@apodkul ha yes there are more than two. I see eight from my perch.
Trump is talking to troops in Afghanistan at this ball. https://t.co/pDkr3EwJPD
"I like the fact that you all voted for me," Trump tells the military ball. https://t.co/DNMdFbzQJB
The presidential seal was just affixed to this podium. These remarks to the military ball may be longer? https://t.co/0ccYd2J1Jg
These are the largest Corinthian columns in the world apparently. https://t.co/2Ia8PUTlzh
I do have a little bit of vertigo up here though. https://t.co/uHu1sQfTW9
The National Building Museum is one of the nicest buildings in DC https://t.co/canx0qmbU5
Two balls down. One to go. https://t.co/atTAOp0iSf
Folks were packed in to get a glimpse of POTUS. https://t.co/a9s745n3UR
It's hard to show how cavernous this room is. https://t.co/CMIdeghPKY
Purple Rain ahead of POTUS appearance at the first ball. https://t.co/U1gX8wbWMs
Loud cheers at My Way. https://t.co/FczLuQ9mVR
POTUS chief of staff Looking for his spot. https://t.co/yVBi0vjyUs
Also never seen so many people giving the presidential motorcade the finger.
This may be the longest motorcade I've ever been in.
I'm off to the balls with @APkfreking and the @realDonaldTrump pool. https://t.co/WqFIYK2sby
These folks are within earshot of St John's Episcopal where the Trumps are attending church. https://t.co/on0z1cmBVd
Not what you usually see at Farragut North. https://t.co/ytrGSqTaiO
"He's here for the working man." -Adam Coletti, Plainfield, CT 'Renegade Pig' heading down to @realDonaldTrump inauguration on metro
"He's taking away from his lavish lifestyle to straighten out the country." -Sal Didato, E. Haddam, CT, 'Renegade Pig' before inauguration
Adam knew he had to come to DC today the moment he heard Trump won. "You have a man who's tired of the same old political scheme."
Sean Ruane, Adam Coletti, Sal Didato of the Renegade Pigs - a law enforcement biker club - taking the metro down foâ€¦ https://t.co/JfD1GKkQX6
Retweeting to say thanks to wranglers and advance folks retiring today who saved us from giant ice sculptures and oâ€¦ https://t.co/HJQvT62m89

What I've learned about golf on the WH beat has surpassed my wildest dreams -> "In 100 pages, Golf Digest examines the new Golfer-in-Chief."

Also on the Obama menu today: turkey, ham, prime rib, chicken wings; cornbread stuffing w/ chorizo, and oyster stuffing. Mac and cheese. /2
